title: create config variable for fastq file extension
body: FASTQ file extensions can be fq.gz or fastq.gz. Currently it is hardcoded in createInput.py and it would be better if the assignment is in the config file so that the user can put the proper file extension.

title: Cannot create directory report in slurm*.out for analysis directory
body: When the analysis directory is already created, running snp.sh again will report this. Minor text fix needed to prevent this error message.

title: format.sh is not being created by createFormatReference.py
body: the script does not run nor output error message.
